short_description: Indonesian fried rice with sweet soy sauce and egg.
nutrition_benefits: Energy from rice, protein from egg.

short_description: Chicken skewers with spicy peanut sauce.
nutrition_benefits: High protein, healthy fats from peanuts.

short_description: Slow-cooked spiced beef in coconut, often called world's most delicious.
nutrition_benefits: High protein, MCTs from coconut.

short_description: Indonesian salad with vegetables, tofu, and peanut dressing.
nutrition_benefits: Varied vegetables, plant protein.

short_description: Turmeric chicken soup with glass noodles and boiled eggs.
nutrition_benefits: High protein, anti-inflammatory turmeric.

short_description: Indonesian fried noodles with sweet soy sauce, vegetables, and choice of protein. A beloved street food classic.
steps: Cook noodles, drain and toss with oil.
cooking_tips: Kecap manis is key to flavor.
nutrition_benefits: Balanced meal with protein and carbs. Quick and satisfying.

short_description: Indonesian meatball soup with springy beef balls in clear broth with noodles and vegetables.
steps: Blend beef with garlic, tapioca, ice.
cooking_tips: Ice keeps meat cold for bouncy texture.
nutrition_benefits: Protein-rich. Comforting and warming.

short_description: Yellow Indonesian chicken soup with turmeric, herbs, and various toppings. A complete meal in a bowl.
nutrition_benefits: Lean protein from chicken. Anti-inflammatory turmeric.

short_description: Indonesian salad with blanched vegetables, tofu, and eggs in peanut sauce. Nutritious and satisfying.
steps: Make sauce with peanut butter, kecap manis, tamarind.
cooking_tips: Sauce can be adjusted to taste.
nutrition_benefits: Plant protein from tofu and peanuts. Fiber from vegetables.

short_description: Smashed fried chicken served with sambal and vegetables. Originating from East Java.
steps: Make sambal with chilies and shrimp paste.
nutrition_benefits: High protein from chicken. Spices aid metabolism.

short_description: Goat satay with sweet soy marinade. A popular street food often served at celebrations.
steps: Serve with kecap manis and shallots.
nutrition_benefits: Lean protein from goat. Iron and zinc.

short_description: Indonesian potato fritters with meat and spices. Crispy outside, soft inside.
nutrition_benefits: Carbs for energy. Protein from beef and eggs.

short_description: Black beef soup from East Java colored by keluak nuts. Deeply savory and aromatic.
steps: Open keluak nuts, scrape out meat.
Serve with bean sprouts and rice.
nutrition_benefits: High in protein. Unique nutritional profile from keluak.

short_description: Sweet thick pancake with various toppings like chocolate, cheese, and peanuts. Popular street dessert.
nutrition_benefits: Indulgent treat. Energy from carbs and fats.

short_description: Green rice flour balls filled with palm sugar, coated in coconut. A classic Indonesian sweet.
steps: Mix flour with pandan and water.
nutrition_benefits: Natural sugars from palm sugar. Gluten-free.

short_description: Indonesian coconut milk pancakes, can be sweet or savory. Soft and slightly chewy texture.
cooking_tips: Use traditional clay pan if available.
nutrition_benefits: Energy from rice and coconut. Gluten-free.

short_description: Iced dessert with green rice flour jelly, coconut milk, and palm sugar syrup. Refreshing and sweet.
steps: Mix flours with pandan and water.
Press through cendol mold into ice water.
Layer cendol, coconut milk, syrup, ice.
nutrition_benefits: Refreshing treat. Natural sweetness from palm sugar.

short_description: Chicken in white coconut curry, traditional for Lebaran celebration. Mild and aromatic.
nutrition_benefits: Protein from chicken. Rich and festive dish.

short_description: Sweet fried beef from Java, braised then fried until crispy. Intensely flavorful.
steps: Simmer with spices and palm sugar.
nutrition_benefits: Protein-rich. The double cooking makes it tender.

short_description: Vegetable stew in coconut milk from Central Java. Creamy and mildly spiced.
nutrition_benefits: Nutritious vegetables. Healthy fats from coconut.
